t: Amazon launches 'last mile' distribution facility in Lowell. | 5newsonline.com
s: — Amazon has expanded its shipping efforts, bringing hundreds of jobs to Northwest Arkansas. The company has launched a "last mile" facility in Lowell. The 60,000 square foot facility will be a final stop in Amazon's transportation network before packages are delivered to customers' doorsteps.
